org.araneaframework.http.core
Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.http.core.Constants

public class Constants
extends Object

Some constants and other global data that are used by the compiler and the runtime.

Author:
Anil K. Vijendran, Harish Prabandham, Shawn Bayern, Mark Roth Copied from Apache Tomcat for internal use. Use the original version (http://tomcat.apache.org/) if you need it outside Aranea.

CACHED_DTD_PUBLIC_IDS

public static final String[] CACHED_DTD_PUBLIC_IDS
List of the Public IDs that we cache, and their associated location. This is used by an EntityResolver to return the location of the cached copy of a DTD.
